TopicTitle: Increasing Tier 2 launch pad part count?

Articles.Content: I'm looking to edit the launch pad config, does anyone know where it is or how to edit it? The 30 part cap is way too low and I can't build complex probes that I'd like to. The weight limit isn't a problem, just the part count.
The 30 part cap limit is part of the VAB upgrade.
Dropping this in Add-on Affairs, since it relates to making alterations to the stock game. Carry on ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> I'm looking to edit the launch pad config, does anyone know where it is or how to edit it? The 30 part cap is way too low and I can't build complex probes that I'd like to. The weight limit isn't a problem, just the part count.

Launch Pad is not part-count limited. It's the VAB that is part-count limited.
